metadata.title: CVE-2023-31085 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/mtd/ubi/cdev.c in the Linux kernel 6.2. There is a divide-by-zero error in do_div(sz,mtd->erasesize), used indirectly by ctrl_cdev_ioctl, when mtd->erasesize is 0.
